snippet.title: Lego Agents: Mission X [FULL GAME]
snippet.description:
This flash game was released in 2008 to coincide with the release of the Lego Agents line, which is my personal favourite Lego line. Sadly it was removed a year or two later and has been lost in obscurity ever since, with the only YouTube upload being the first two levels. So after battling getting the game working after Flash died completely, and trying to get a watchable playthrough without any technical difficulties, here's the full game!

Honestly, it's a bit more barebones than I remember, the graphics are way more bitcrushed and the hitbox is kinda broken, but it's still an alright game and was good to play for some nostalgia.

EnjoyojnE.
